title: (x) "Modern" Monospaced Fonts ID - Andale Mono, Inconsolata {Florian}
content:
Identification of the attached fonts would be very much appreciated. Also suggestions of fonts like that or like OCR B, Orator, Letter Gothic would be very helpful.  
Thanks in advance.

Costas
author: Cubic_DS

comments.content:
In the meantime – contemporary monospaced typefaces:

[Andale Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/andale-mono/?refby=mfde)  
 [Consolas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/consolas/?refby=mfde)  
 [Etelka Monospace](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typefaces-56-etelka-monospace-pro)  
 [Lineto Excellent](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Typewriter+Fonts/Excellent/)  
 [Fedra Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra_mono)  
 [Monaco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/monaco/?refby=mfde)  
 [Nexus Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_nexus_typewriter/)  
 [Nitti](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.boldmonday.com/en/nitti)  
 [PTL Notes Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.primetype.com/faces_info.php?fid=21)  
 [TheSans Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesansmono/)  
 [T-Star Mono Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gestalten/tstar_mono_round_ot/)  
Vera Sans Mono  
DejaVu Sans Mono  
Droid Sans Mono  
 [More monospaced typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/monospaced/)
Kulor.net uses Andale, the font for studioaad.com is [Inconsolata](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230510/http:/typekit.com/colophons/ohn4tqh), served by Typekit.

A great thanks Florian! Your answer was more than a great help...  
Thanks again.

Costas
